description: Governance Threshold Configuration Manifest (GTCM). Specifies mandatory arbitration and operational constraints enforced by TAA.

metadata.unit_normalization: Decimal (0.0 to 1.0) unless unit is specified in configuration entry.

operational_utility_min.description: Minimum required utility score for autonomous decision execution.

stability_ratio_min.description: Minimum required score for system decision robustness.

systemic_exposure_max.description: Maximum allowed systemic risk exposure or resource commitment.

priority_one_tolerance_delta.description: Maximum absolute variance allowed in P01 metrics before triggering mandatory governance review.
